错误报告！

replies.author: MC_tingfeng
replies.txt_content:
实体报错：
Details:
        Name: ic2:pump // ic2.core.block.machine.tileentity.TileEntityPump
        Block type: ID #253 (ic2.te // ic2.core.block.BlockTileEntity // ic2:te)
        Block data value: 1 / 0x1 / 0b0001
        Block location: World: (75,61,1210), Chunk: (at 11,3,10 in 4,75; contains blocks 64,0,1200 to 79,255,1215), Region: (0,2; contains chunks 0,64 to 31,95, blocks 0,0,1024 to 511,255,1535)
        Actual block type: ID #253 (ic2.te // ic2.core.block.BlockTileEntity // ic2:te)
        Actual block data value: 1 / 0x1 / 0b0001复制代码实体名称：ic2  水泵
实体位置：75.61.1210

解决办法1：删除所在区块，区块所在文件：world文件夹，region文件夹，r.0.2.mca
解决办法2：安装picktiem插件，https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-421203-1-1.html，启动一次服务器，生成配置文件后在pickitem的config中加入-253  id
然后重启服务器
